data.title: Nicolas Roeg Filmography
data.text:
1958 THE GREAT VAN ROBBERY cameraman

1961 INFORMATION RECEIVED cameraman

1962 LAWRENCE OF ARABIA 2nd unit photography

1963 THE CARETAKER / THE GUEST director of photography

1964 CODE 7 / VICTIM FIVE director of photography

1964 THE GUEST/ THE CARETAKER director of photography

1964 NOTHING BUT THE BEST director of photography

1966 A FUNNY THING HAPPENED ON THE WAY TO THE FORUM director of photography

1966 FAHRENHEIT 451 director of photography

1967 CASINO ROYALE additional photography

1967 FAR FROM THE MADDING CROWD director of photography

1968 PETULIA director of photography

1970 PERFORMANCE co-director, director of photography

1971 WALKABOUT director, director of photography

1973 GLASTONBURY FAYRE director of photography

1973 DON'T LOOK NOW director

1976 THE MAN WHO FELL TO EARTH director

1980 BAD TIMING: A SENSUAL OBSESSION director, song composer

1981 EUREKA director

1985 INSIGNIFICANCE director

1987 CASTAWAY director

1988 ARIA director, screenwriter "Un Ballo in Maschera"

1988 TRACK 29 director

1990 THE WITCHES director

1990 WITHOUT YOU I'M NOTHING executive producer

1991 CHICAGO LOOP director

1991 THE YOUNG INDIANA JONES CHRONICLES - PARIS 1916 director

1992 COLD HEAVEN director

1994 HEART OF DARKNESS director

1995 TWO DEATHS director

1995 FULL BODY MASSAGE director

1996 THE BIBLE: SAMSON AND DELILAH director
